Date Util¶

class util.date_util.DateUtil[source]¶

This class provides date utilities

check_format_timestamp(s, format)[source]¶

checks that a string respects a given date format

Parameters:
  • s (str) – a string representation of a time
  • format (str) – time format (e.g, YYYY-mm-dd)
get_month_from_int(month_int)[source]¶

converts int to month name

Parameters:month_int (int) – numeric representation of the month
get_start_time_span(reference_time, time_unit, format)[source]¶

gets start time

Parameters:
  • reference_time (datetime) – input time
  • time_unit (str) – time unit (week, month, year)
  • format (str) – time format (e.g, YYYY-mm-dd)
get_time_fromtimestamp(creation_time, format)[source]¶

gets time Object from string

Parameters:
  • creation_time (str) – creation time
  • format (str) – time format (e.g, YYYY-mm-dd)
get_timestamp(creation_time, format)[source]¶

gets timestamp from string

Parameters:
  • creation_time (str) – creation time
  • format (str) – time format (e.g, YYYY-mm-dd)
get_weekday_from_int(day_int)[source]¶

converts int to week day

Parameters:day_int (int) – numeric representation of the week day
